name: Schooner browser

screenshots.caption: A screenshot showing the bookmarks box and tabs.

short_description:
Look at your browser now.  Look at all of the fancy buttons.  Look at all of the features you never use.  Now, think about all of the space, both in the window and on your disk, that those features take up.

Schooner solves all of these problems.  It is a lightweight browser with all of the features that you need and none that you don't, built in VB.NET.  The design brief that I followed when I built it was "it's a web browser for people who just want to browse the web."  Revel in the lack of extra features!

Schooner's development name was YourWeb, so the code files are listed under that name.  It'll still install as Schooner, though.

Just download the "Schooner.zip" file and run "setup.exe".

You can access the code by going to "Files" and then opening the "VB project" folder.  Don't open "Code".

Schooner is completly public domain, liscensed under CC 0.  If you feel it has helped you, please rate and review it!
summary: A simple, lightweight browser for Windows.
